body: yokoshima salaryman: the chaddest of all chads

As far as job positions go, a Salaryman is pretty much the bottom of the white collar food chain. This begs the question, if a low level employee is a badass like that it make you wonder what sort of titans and gods take up the higher positions oft he organization he works for.  Anyway glad to see this series going strong still, the world needs more badass businessmen.
Kikurage puts more than masturbation girl
hmm.... 'puff-puff' is obviously a stew... cause when you eat hot stuff you go 'puff-puff' but it also can be a curry dish it will also make you go 'puff-puff'.....
Nah...Don't bother about the Salaryman too much, i bet he just want to crush ton of pussies while being Gary Stu(so perfect as to be annoying) and that's it.
@Nagito With his skill, he doesn't need to. The Salaryman name seems more like a title at this point to hide his badassery.
